segments.text: Good morning . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'm looking for an apartment , I'd like two bedrooms .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Have a seat , please . Let me ask you a few questions . First of all , may I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you spell your last name , Mr.Eakins .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: E-A-K-I-N-S.First name , Donald . And what's your present address , Mr.Eakins ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 1446 Pine . That's in San Francisco , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1
